21544.「リウ老師……。\n そなたは いったい どこにいるのじゃ……。: Master Liu... Where could you possibly be...?

21545.「う～む……。そうやって ぼんやりしながら\n 一日中 何もしねえ アンタは\n:
Hmm... You've just been standing there spaced out all day, doing nothing at all! I'd say you're the most useless person
in history!

21547.「ポツコン３号？ よく わからぬが……\n おぬし 今 余を 役立たずと申したな:
Junkey #3? I'm not sure what you mean by that, but... Did you just dare call me "useless"?! How rude! It'd be your head for saying such
a thing!

21548.「このような時代に 来ることがなければ\n 余は 今ごろ たいそうな技術を\n:
Had I not come here, I would have learned a
great deal from Master Liu by now!

21549.「そうじゃ！ リウ老師は 言っておった！\n 余が 成人した あかつきには\n:
Yes, that is what he said! He said that once
I came of age, he would teach me something
very special!

21550.「あのときの約束さえ 果たされていたら……: If only he were able to fulfill his promise...

21552.「よかった！ <pc> ここに いたのね。\n あなたが ガラクタ城にいるって\:
Oh, good! There you are! I heard from someone
in town that you were here, so I just had to
rush over!

21553.「カルサドラ火山で 大変なことが起きてるの！:
Something horrible is going on inside the
Calsadora Volcano!

21554.「火山を調査している 学者さんの話によると\n 魔物の大群が 火山に押し寄せて\:
The scholars investigating there say that hordes of monsters suddenly came rushing inside, and that they're performing some kind
of ritual!

21556.「え……。な…なに この子……？\n お父さん また 子供を拾ってきたの？:
Huh...? Who...who's this...?
Dad, did you bring in another straggler,
or what?

21557.「今の話は 本当よ。\n 私も 遠巻きにだけど 鳥っぽい魔物が\n 火口付近に集:
Yes, it's true. I saw it myselfーthere were
bird-like monsters gathering inside the
crater.

21558.「<pc>よ 聞いたかえ！？\n グルヤンラシュじゃ！\n ついに きゃつが 動:
Did you hear that, <pc>?!
It's Guryan Rush! He's finally shown his
hand!

21560.「くわしく 説明している時間はない！\n カルサドラ火山こそ きゃつの新たな根城:
I haven't the time to explain! One thing is
clear, however! That volcano is his new
stronghold where he is plotting and scheming!

21561.「あなたの言っていることは\n よく わからないけど……。\n 不吉な予感がする:
I'm not really sure I get it, but...
It definitely seems weird.

21562.「だから すぐにでも 火口付近に行って\n あやしい儀式を 止めたいんだけど……:
That's why I'd like to go to the crater so I
can stop that ritual... But unless I can fly,
I'm not able to get close enough.

21563.「ねえ！ <pc> お願い！\n カルサドラ火山の 火口付近に行く方法を\n 私:
Say, <pc>! Do you think you could
help me find a way to get close to the
volcano's crater?<yesno><close>

21564.「そう言わずに お願いよ！\n 私 ひとりでは 間に合わないかもしれないわ！\n:
Please, I really need your help here! I don't
think I'll be able to do this by myself...and
there's already quite a few monsters there!

21565.「ありがとう <pc>！\n 外から 火口付近に行くのは ムリみたいだから\n:
Thanks! We can't get to the crater from the
outside, so let's see if we can't find a way
there from the inside!

21566.「溶岩の流れる洞くつを 進むことになるけど\n ほかに方法が 思いつかないわ！\:
The only way I can think of is through the
cave filled with lava! I guess I'll go on
ahead!

21568.「溶岩の流れる洞くつを行くなど みすみす\n 死ににいくようなものじゃ。そなたの:
To walk through a cave filled with lava is simply marching straight to your death. Why would a delicate maiden such as yourself
take such a risk?!

21569.「私たちの世界が 危険にさらされてるのよ？\n 私たちの手で なんとかするのが当:
Our world's in danger, you know? So, it's up
to us do something about it.

21571.「……そうか。\n じゃがな どれだけ そなたが がんばっても\n カルサドラ火:
I see... Be that as it may, there's no way
you'll be able to reach the volcano's crater!
No matter how hard you try!

21572.「カルサドラ火山の火口……。\n そこは かつて ガテリア皇国の民が\n 儀式に:
The crater of Calsadora Volcano was once a
sacred place... It was used by the Gaterian
people as part of their ceremonies.

21573.「そのため 他国の者が 火口に立ち入らぬよう\n 徒歩で行ける道は すべて封じた:
For that reason, they closed all manners of
entry on foot so that those from other
countries could not enter.

21574.「なんですって！？\n そんなことをしたら その儀式にだって\n みんな 行けな:
What?! If that's true, then...no one would be
able to go to those ceremonies at all!

21575.「ふっふっふ。心配には及ばぬ。\n なぜならば……:
Heh, heh, heh... There's no need to worry.
You see...

21576.「ガテリアの民は 道を封じる前に\n 火口への転送装置を 作っておいたからな！:
Before they blocked off all entry points,
Gateria built a transporter that leads
straight to the crater!

21577.「火口への転送装置？\n そんなモノが……。:
A transporter to the crater?
Never would have guessed...

21578.「転送装置は 技術的には高度なものだが\n 作り自体は単純なものである！ あれな:
The transporter is quite the technical marvel,
but very simple in design! I'm certain it
could work even today!

21579.「よしッ！ それでは <pc>よ！\n 転送装置を動かす 起動器具……\n 三闘:
Very good! Now then, <pc>! You must
bring me the transporter's activation
device...the Axe of the Triad!

21581.「……コホン。<pc>よ。もったいぶらずに\n 持ってくるのじゃ。三闘士のオノく:
Ahem... No dallying. Bring it here to me.
The Axe DOES still exist today, yes?<yesno><close>

21582.「なに言ってんですッ！ 元ポツコン２号ッ！\n そんな名前のもん うちには ねえ:
Whaddya talking about, Junkey #2?!
I ain't got anything like that here! Never
seen or heard of it before!

21583.「な なんじゃとッ！？\n 三闘士のオノすら この時代には\n ないと申すかッ！:
W-what?! You mean to tell me that not even
the Axe of the Triad exists anymore?!

21584.「なんということじゃ……。\n たったひとつの道が 断たれてしもうた……。\n:
This can't be... Our last hope has been
crushed to pieces... It's all over...

21586.「なに あきらめてるのよ！？\n ないなら 作ればいいじゃない！:
You're really just going to give up?
If one doesn't exist, then we'll just
make another!

21587.「さ 三闘士のオノを作るじゃと？\n 単純な作りのものゆえ 作れるかもしれぬが\:
Make another Axe of the Triad, you say?
While it may be possible, I have never
heard of such a way.

21588.「できるかもしれないことは\n あきらめずに やってみるのよ。\n 道を 切りひ:
You have to try what you can without giving
up. That's the only way you can push forward.

21590.「さあ そのオノのこと くわしく教えて。\n 今 頼れるのは それを知ってる\n:
Please tell me more about the Axe. Since you
are the only one who knows about it, you're
all I have to rely on.

21591.「う うむ。それでは……\n そちたちにも 三闘士のオノを作るため\n 手伝って:
Y...yes. Very well... I shall enlist your
aid in helping me create the Axe.

21592.「<pc>。そちは 魔導の歯車と\n 古代の戦刃というモノを 手に入れてまいれ。:
<pc>. You must obtain for me both a
Magic Gear and an Ancient Blade. The
Axe cannot be created without them.

21593.「よいか？ 魔導の歯車は <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>。\n 古代の戦刃は:
Understood? You can find a Magic Gear from
Green Scissors, and Genji Beetles may drop
an Ancient Blade.

21594.「ひとまず その ふたつさえあれば\n 三闘士のオノの原型が できるはずじゃ。\:
With these two items, we should at least be
able to make an Axe prototype. Well? Will
you do this for me?

21595.「うむ！ ふたつの材料を手に入れたら\n ガラクタ城に 戻ってくるのじゃぞ。:
Great! Return here once you've collected
both items.

21596.「そなたは <pc>が帰ってくるまで\n ここで 余の手伝いをしてたもれ。\n:
Until <pc> returns, you can stay
here to assist me. There's still much
preparation that needs doing beforehand.

21597.「余に 三闘士のオノが作れるかは わからぬ。\n ……だが そなたの言うように\:
I am not certain that I will be successful...
But, as you say, I will believe in my own
strength and try.

21598.「うん。お願いね。\n 私たちも 信じてるよ。: Please. We all believe in you, too.

21599.「不思議な子ね。\n 火山のことや 昔のことを知ってたりして。\n でも そのお:
You know all about the volcano and stuff from
the past... You're pretty strange. But heyー
it came in real handy to help us out.

21600.「それじゃ <pc>。\n 三闘士のオノを みんなで作りましょう！:
Alright, <pc>. Let's do what we
can to make that Axe!

21601.「<%sEV_QUE_NAME0>と <%sEV_QUE_NAME1>は\n ど:
Green Scissors and Genji Beetles can both
be found in the Molinara Forest.

21602.「……ムムッ！\n そちは 下々の者の依頼を たくさん抱えており\n 余の頼みは:
...What's this?! It seems you're too burdened
with requests from other common folk to help
with mine.

21603.「……残念じゃが 仕方がない。\n ほかの依頼を片付けたら 余を手伝ってたもれ。:
...I suppose there's no helping it, is there?
You can assist me when you are finished.
I'm counting on it!

21604.「……なんと！ 余が やる気を出したというに\n そちは 手を貸してくれぬと申す:
What?!? I've been overcome with motivation
and yet you refuse to help me?! I'm
disappointed in you!

21605.「とはいえ 頼れるのは そちしか おらぬ。\n そう言わずに 手を貸してくれぬか:
Even still...you are the only person I can
rely on. Won't you reconsider? I will
be here, so please think it over.

21606.「おお <pc>よ！\n 転送装置を動かす 三闘士のオノを作るため\n 余の手伝:
Oh, <pc>! Have you decided to help
me? We need the Axe of the Triad to
power the transporter!

21607.「グルヤンラシュが 謀り事をめぐらす\n カルサドラ火山の 火口付近に行くには\:
If we hope to get to Guryan Rush's stronghold
within the crater, we must use that ancient
transporter. It's the only way.

21608.「三闘士のオノを作るために 必要な材料は\n 魔導の歯車と 古代の戦刃の ふたつ:
The two items needed for the Axe are a
Magic Gear and an Ancient Blade. I want
you to gather them for me.

21609.「よいか？ 魔導の歯車は <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>。\n 古代の戦刃は:
Understood? You can find a Magic Gear from
Green Scissors, and Genji Beetles may drop
an Ancient Blade.

21610.「ひとまず その ふたつさえあれば\n 三闘士のオノの原型が できるはずじゃ。\:
With these two items, we should at least be
able to make an Axe prototype. Well? Will
you do this for me?

21611.「グルヤンラシュが 謀り事をめぐらす\n カルサドラ火山の 火口付近に行くには\:
If we hope to get to Guryan Rush's stronghold
within the crater, we must use that ancient
transporter. It's the only way.

21612.「その転送装置を動かす 三闘士のオノを作るため\n そちには 魔導の歯車と 古代:
To make the Axe of the Triad necessary for
the transporter, I will need both a Magic
Gear and an Ancient Blade.

21613.「よいか？ 魔導の歯車は <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>。\n 古代の戦刃は:
Understood? You can find a Magic Gear from
Green Scissors, and Genji Beetles may drop
an Ancient Blade.

21614.「ふたつの材料を手に入れたら\n ガラクタ城に 戻ってきてたもれ。\n 余は そ:
When you've gathered both items, please
return here. While you do that, I will be
here making preparations.

21615.「<%sEV_QUE_NAME0>と <%sEV_QUE_NAME1>は\n ど:
Green Scissors and Genji Beetles can both
be found in the Molinara Forest.

21616.「おお <pc>よ！\n よくぞ 戻った！\n 頼んだ品は 手に入れてきたかえ？:
Oh, <pc>! Welcome back! Did you
receive what you asked for?

21617.ビャン・ダオに\n魔導の歯車と 古代の戦刃を 渡しますか？<yesno><clo:
Would you give Byan Dao the Magic Gear and the
Ancient Blade?<yesno><close>

21618.「これこれ <pc>。\n 余は そちの おちょくりに興じるほど\n ヒマを 持:
This and that <pc>. I don't have time
for your teasing, do I?

21619.<pc>は ビャン・ダオに\n魔導の歯車と 古代の戦刃を 渡した！:
<pc> hands Byan Dao the Magic Gear
and the Ancient Cog!

21620.「うむ！ これじゃ これじゃ！\n 大儀であったな <pc>よ！\n さあ ほう:
Mm! This, this! Well done, <pc>!
Now, you will receive your reward!

21621.「……では 転送装置の起動器具\n 三闘士のオノを 作ってみるとしよう。:
So, let's try to make a transporter activation
device, the Triad Axe.

21622.「ダストン殿。\n ここにある物を 使ってもよいかの？: Mr. Duston. May I use something here?

21623.「なっ！ ここにあるのは どれも役に立たねえ\n ガラクタばかりでごぜえますッ！:
Nah! All of this is useless junk! That's not
going to happen even if we tried to use them!

21624.「ふふふ…… 何を申すか。ここにある物からは\n 失われた文明の息吹を 感じるぞ:
Hmmm... what can I say? I can feel the breath
of a lost civilization in these objects.
Perfect for the parts of the Triad Axe.

21625.「はじめて出会ったときは\n うす汚れた ただの貧民かと思ったが……。\n ダス:
When I first met him, I thought he was just a
poor man with a dirty face... but Duston, you
are a man with a very good eye.

21626.「や…やめてくだせえ！\n ほめられるようなことをした覚えはねえですッ！\n 使:
Stop it! I don't remember doing anything to be
praised! If you can use it, use it!

21627.「よし！ それでは リウ老師直伝の技術で\n この物たちに 命を吹き込み\n 三:
Yes! Then let us use the skills handed down by
Master Liu to bring these objects to life and
transform them into Triad Axes!

21628.「……というわけで <pc>よ。\n オノの完成まで 少し時間が かかるじゃろう:
So, <pc>. It will take me a little
while to finish the axe. Please come back
after a while.

21629.「がんばってね ビャンくん。\n あなたなら きっと できるよ！: Good luck, Byan. I'm sure you can do it!

21631.「さっきから 気になっていたんだけど\n あなた いったい 何者？\n どうして:
I've been wondering... who the hell are you?
How do you know so much about the past?

21633.「信じていた父に 見捨てられ……\n 復讐にしか 生き場所を求められぬ\n あわ:
Abandoned by the father he trusted, a poor Man
Who Lived only for revenge.
